MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoWordSelection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoWordSelection : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定使用者以滑鼠拖曳並選取文字部分時，是否要選取該文字其他部分的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether when a user selects part of a word by dragging across it with the mouse, the rest of the word is selected.

value.span: 如果啟用自動文字選取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if automatic word selection is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當已啟用，每次使用者拖曳文字，使用滑鼠的一部分會選取該文字的一部分，選取項目會自動擴大到全字拼寫須。When is enabled, every time that part of a word is selected by the user dragging over part of a word using the mouse, the selection is automatically expanded to include the whole word. 使用者可以暫時反轉的方向中將滑鼠指標拖曳選取項目來覆寫自動選取整個單字。The user can override automatic selection of a whole word by momentarily reversing the direction in which the mouse pointer is being dragged as the selection is made. 此動作會復原全字拼寫須，自動選取，並讓使用者能夠準確地選取部分或所有文字。This action undoes the automatic selection of the whole word, and enables the user to precisely select part or all of the word. 當是停用，請選取項目已不會自動擴展成包含全字拼寫須; 在此情況下，精確的選取項目都一定會決定以手動方式。When is disabled, a selection is not automatically expanded to include whole words; in this case, precise selections are always determined manually. > [!NOTE] > 自動選取項目不會影響使用者拖曳跨越的第一個字。Auto selection does not affect the first word that the user drags across. 它是在這個第一個字組界限超出自動選取項目才會生效之後，才。It is only after this first word boundary is crossed that auto selection takes effect. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 開始變更區塊。

span.span: Begins a change block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 當您呼叫，您還必須呼叫完成的變更區塊否則將會擲回例外狀況。When you call , you must also call to complete the change block otherwise an exception will be thrown. 變更區塊以邏輯方式分組到單一復原單元的多個變更，並防止文字內容或選取範圍變更事件引發之後的變更區塊之前。A change block logically groups multiple changes into a single undo unit and prevents text content or selection change events from being raised until after the change block. 如此一來您可以對多個編輯文字項目，而不用擔心另一個接聽程式會在相同的時間變更的文字項目。This way you can make multiple edits to the text element without the danger of the text element being changed at the same time by another listener. 透過呼叫建立變更區塊方法。A change block is created by calling the method. 呼叫方法會導致所有後續的變更，直到對應呼叫包含在指定的變更區塊方法。Calling the method causes all subsequent changes to be included in the specified change block until a corresponding call to the method is made. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用和建立變更區塊的方法。The following example shows how to use the and methods to create a change block. [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#BeginChangeEndChangeCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/BeginChangeEndChangeExample.cs#beginchangeendchangecodeexampleinline1)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#BeginChangeEndChangeCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/beginchangeendchangeexample.vb#beginchangeendchangecodeexampleinline1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`false`清除復原堆疊。Setting this property to `false` clears the undo stack. 因此，如果您停用復原，然後再重新啟用，復原命令仍然無法運作，因為當您停用復原，復原堆疊已清空。Therefore, if you disable undo and then re-enable it, undo commands still do not work because the undo stack was emptied when you disabled undo. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性中的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example demonstrates how to use the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. summary.span: 鎖住應用程式復原堆疊中的最新復原單位。

span.span: Locks the most recent undo unit of the undo stack of the application.

summary.span: 這可避免已鎖住的單位被後續加入的其他復原單位所合併。

span.span: This prevents the locked unit from being merged with undo units that are added subsequently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非文字的復原單位加入至應用程式的主要復原堆疊時，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method when a non-text undo unit is added to the application's main undo stack. 這可避免已鎖住的單位被後續加入的其他復原單位所合併。This prevents the locked unit from being merged with undo units that are added subsequently.

summary.span: 每當未處理的 路由事件達到其路由中的這個類別時呼叫。

span.span: Called whenever an unhandled routed event reaches this class in its route.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 如果在繼承的中繼類別已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫基底實作。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 這個方法的目的是有點類似[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它可讓您使用的類別處理常式，而不執行個體處理常式來處理從衍生類別相符的事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it lets you handle the matching event from derived classes by using a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，比對的事件是路由的事件。In this case, the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能有由子元素，而不一定是叫用處理常式的項目所引發。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event might have been raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that invokes handlers. 因此，您的實作需要考量之事件引數的來源屬性 （而且不應該嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。Therefore, your implementation needs to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子類別路由收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Subclasses of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 其中一個案例是取用事件的引數，並謹慎地將事件標示為已處理。One scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 仍建議在實作中呼叫 base （），萬一在繼承的中繼類別會實作這個方法。Calling base() in your implementation is still recommended, in case an intermediate class in the inheritance implemented this method. 可能會呼叫 base （） 之前或之後，在特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base() either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是有點類似[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它可讓您使用的類別處理常式，而不執行個體處理常式來處理從衍生類別相符的事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it lets you handle the matching event from derived classes by using a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，比對的事件是路由的事件。In this case, the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能有子元素，而不一定是叫用處理常式的項目所引發。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that invokes handlers. 因此，您的實作需要考量之事件引數的來源屬性 （而且不應該嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。Therefore, your implementation needs to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子類別可以選擇在路由收到事件時呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Subclasses of can choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 其中一個案例是取用事件的引數，並將事件標示為已處理。One scenario is to take the arguments of the event and mark the event as handled.
